text: Pak Gyong-sil (1 February 1975 – 16 July 2006) was a North Korean gymnast. She competed in six events at the 1992 Summer Olympics. She is known for introducing the Pak salto. ==References== ==External links== *https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YsMj-2e-EDQ 1989 Worlds uneven bars performance in which she introduced the Pak salto Category:1975 births Category:2006 deaths Category:North Korean female artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of North Korea Category:Gymnasts at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Pak Gyong-sil
